text: @JoyAnnReid @BradleyWhitford I live in Florida.  I listen to @NYGovCuomo. LOL!  I don't trust anything that comes out of @GovRonDeSantis, @SenRickScott or @RepGusBilirakis' mouth. They are, right now, hiding statistics of COVID-19 cases at nursing, assisted and independent living facilities. #TrumpGenocide
